synopsis.text: The bustling lives of the idols at 765 Production take an even more whimsical turn with the arrival of the Puchidols, adorable creatures bearing a striking resemblance to the idols themselves. Based on the beloved game 'THE IDOLM@STER', this spinoff presents a delightful 4-koma filled with laughter and heartwarming moments. When Ami and Mami, two idols from 765 Pro, introduce the enigmatic Petit-dols 'Afuu' and 'Yukipo', the office becomes a hub of lively antics. Fans of the iDOLM@STER series will adore this charming spinoff, brimming with endearing Puchidols who bring a wave of cheerful chaos to the idols' daily routines.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
